description:
Is the black and white planet in Dune 2 possible? Yes, and there's two possible explanations, but the coolest one has to be the theory of a black sun. But can a black sun really make a WHOLE planet appear black and white?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee and Justin Kuiper
Editor: Dan "Cybert" Seibert
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: This Dune Planet is REAL 🪐? #shorts
